item.title: Travel Apps: Trying Out Polarsteps
item.description: While travelling is becoming more and more common, businesses are catching on to this new trend. Polarsteps is one of those companies that seems to have hit a gap in the market. Their app provides a really neat way of keeping a travel journal. I decided to give the product of this Dutch startup a go on a short trip to Wales…
